Package net.neoforged.neoforge.client.model.data

Class ModelDataManager

java.lang.Object
net.neoforged.neoforge.client.model.data.ModelDataManager
Direct Known Subclasses:
ModelDataManager.Active, ModelDataManager.Snapshot
public abstract sealed class ModelDataManager extends Object permits ModelDataManager.Active, ModelDataManager.Snapshot
A manager for the lifecycle of all the ModelData instances in a Level.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static final class 
    ModelDataManager.Active
    The active manager owned by the client's level and operated on the main client thread.
    static final class 
    ModelDataManager.Snapshot
    A snapshot of the active manager's state in the specified sections at the point in time when a chunk section was prepared for re-rendering.
